# Quick Start Guide

# What do you need ?

  1. RAK7246G - LoRaWAN™ Developer Gateway
  2. 16GB SD Card + Card Reader (included)
  3. 5V at least 1.5A Micro USB Power Supply (optional)
  4. A Windows/Mac OS/Linux Computer

# What's included in the package ?
